text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Consultative Council denounces recent U.S. Congressional vote to recognise Jerusalem as the unified capital of Israel.
- Bahrain's emir praises relations with the United States after meeting the U.S. defence secretary who is touring Gulf Arab states.
- Bahrain's Chamber of Commerce and Industry to hold a seminar on privatisation challenges on Tuesday.
- Bahrain affirms its support to a Palestinian state with Jerusalem as its capital.
- Cement consumption in Bahrain drops by eight percent in the first five months of 1997.
- U.S. defence secretary says the U.S. seeks to boost relations with Bahrain. Emir is invited to visit the United States this year.
